songs.title: Inertiatic ESP
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Now I'm lost
Now I'm lost
Now I'm lost
Now I'm lost

[Verse 1]
Last night I heard lepers
Flinch like birth defects
Its musk was fecal in origin
As the words dribbled off of its chin
Which said "I'm lost, I'm lost"

[Chorus]
Now I'm lost
Now I'm lost
Now I'm lost
Now I'm lost
Now I'm lost
Now I'm lost

[Verse 2]
Dolls wreck the minced meat of pupils
Cast in oblong arms length
The hooks have been picking their scabs where
Wolves hide in the company of men
Which said "I'm lost, I'm lost"

[Chorus]
Now I'm lost
Now I'm lost
Now I'm lost
Now I'm lost
Now I'm lost
Now I'm lost

[Verse 3]
Are you peaking in the red?
Perforated at the neck
What of this mongrel architect
A broken arm of sewers set
Past present and future tense
Clip side of the pink eyed fountain
What of this mongrel architect
A broken arm of sewers set
Past present and future tense
Clip side of the pink eyed fountain

[Chorus]
Now I'm lost
Now I'm lost
Now I'm lost
Now I'm lost

[Outro]
It's been said
Long time ago
You'll be the first
And last to know
Aaah
You'll never know
Aaah
You'll never know
You'll never know
You'll never know
